57372f7d245977699b53e301.Description: A waterproof package of 5.45x39 US gs cartridges, 120 pieces.

57486e672459770abd687134.Name: OKP-7 reflex sight
57486e672459770abd687134.Description: The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing. This variant is installed on the dovetail type mount.

57513f9324597720a7128161.Name: Grand juice
57513f9324597720a7128161.Description: Grand pomegranate juice, great drink for those who lack bitterness in their lives.

57372f5c24597769917c0131.Name: 30 pcs. 5.45x39 T gs ammo pack
57372f5c24597769917c0131.Description: A paper package of 5.45x39 T gs cartridges, 30 pieces.

5739d41224597779c3645501.Name: 16 pcs. 9x19 Pst Gzh ammo box
5739d41224597779c3645501.Description: Cardboard box of 9x19 Pst Gzh ammo, 16 rounds.

575062b524597720a31c09a1.Name: Green Ice
575062b524597720a31c09a1.Description: Sweetened green tea drink, for consumption ice-cold.

57372ee1245977685d4159b5.Name: 120 pcs. 5.45x39 T gs ammo pack
57372ee1245977685d4159b5.Description: A waterproof package of 5.45x39 T gs cartridges, 120 pieces.

5751496424597720a27126da.Name: Hot Rod
5751496424597720a27126da.Description: Hot Rod, though being the most recognizable energy drink in the world, is not much more powerful that its counterparts. The standards are the same for all.

57372fc52459776998772ca1.Name: 120 pcs. 5.45x39 US gs ammo pack
57372fc52459776998772ca1.Description: A damaged waterproof package of 5.45x39 US gs cartridges, 120 pieces.

57513fcc24597720a31c09a6.Name: Vita juice
57513fcc24597720a31c09a6.Description: Multifruit and multivitamin juice can be confusing tastewise, but it sure is healthy.

575146b724597720a27126d5.Name: Pack of milk
575146b724597720a27126d5.Description: 1L package of milk that mysteriously survived until now.

5737300424597769942d5a01.Name: 30 pcs. 5.45x39 US gs ammo pack
5737300424597769942d5a01.Description: A paper package of 5.45x39 US gs cartridges, 30 pieces.

5751487e245977207e26a315.Name: Emelya rye croutons
5751487e245977207e26a315.Description: Emelya rye croutons with assorted flavours were a favourite snack of teens and lazy beer drinkers, but, unlike them, stayed behind.

573733c72459776b0b7b51b0.Name: 30 pcs. 5.45x39 SP ammo box
573733c72459776b0b7b51b0.Description: A box of 5.45x39 SP sport-hunting cartridges, 30 pieces.

57505f6224597709a92585a9.Name: Alyonka chocolate bar
57505f6224597709a92585a9.Description: The best known milk chocolate of post-Soviet space, sweet and creamy.

576a581d2459771e7b1bc4f1.Name: Yarygin MP-443 Grach 9x19 pistol
576a581d2459771e7b1bc4f1.Description: Russian-produced semiautomatic 9x19 pistol, a service weapon of the Russian army, special forces of Ministry of internal affairs and other defense and law enforcement agencies.

5751435d24597720a27126d1.Name: Max energy
5751435d24597720a27126d1.Description: Max Energy energy drink, designed like a battery, but different in contents - regular caffeine,  sugar, and flavoring.

57616c112459773cce774d66.Name: Izhmash SOK-12 Sb.0-2 dust cover
57616c112459773cce774d66.Description: Standard issue Izhmash-manufactured SOK-12 metal dust cover.

57513f07245977207e26a311.Name: Apple juice
57513f07245977207e26a311.Description: Clarified and reconstituted apple juice, a bit refreshing, a bit sweet.

574d967124597745970e7c94.Name: Simonov Semi-Automatic Carbine SKS 7.62x39
574d967124597745970e7c94.Description: Soviet semi-automatic carbine designed by Sergei Simonov for 7.62x39 cartridge and known abroad as SKS-45. Immensely popular both in CIS countries and in the West, this weapon is still in active service in some countries in form of various copies and modifications. This particular specimen comes from extended storage warehouses of Tula Arms Plant and haven't yet undergo the civilian weapon normalization procedure.

57514643245977207f2c2d09.Name: TarCola
57514643245977207f2c2d09.Description: TarCola is a widely spread cola-flavored soft drink produced, before the conflict, by a local drinks manufacturer.

5755383e24597772cb798966.Name: Vaseline
5755383e24597772cb798966.Description: Vaseline, or, more precisely, petroleum jelly, is a versatile ointment used for a number of purposes where its water insulation and lubrication properties are required, for instance, treating small cuts and burns, coating corrosion-prone items or lubricating gear that requires non-acidic lubricants.

5755356824597772cb798962.Name: AI-2 medikit
5755356824597772cb798962.Description: The AI-2 medikit was developed as a standard service first aid kit for various defence and law enforcement agencies and civil defense forces of USSR. In case of all-out conflict with the use of weapons of mass destruction it should have been distributed to the population  of the affected and surrounding areas.

57616a9e2459773c7a400234.Name: Sb.5 5-round 12/76 magazine for SOK-12 and compatible weapons
57616a9e2459773c7a400234.Description: 5-round Sb.5 polymer plastic magazine for SOK-12 and compatible weapons, intended for use with 12/76  or 12/70 shells.

576fd4ec2459777f0b518431.Name: Zenit-Belomo PSO 1M2-1 4x24 scope
576fd4ec2459777f0b518431.Description: Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2-1, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for precision sight fire with Special Sniper Rifle (VSS) and Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.

5780cda02459777b272ede61.Name: Dorm room 306 Key
5780cda02459777b272ede61.Description: A dorm room key with 306 tag on it.

576167ab2459773cad038c43.Name: SOK-12 Protection tube
576167ab2459773cad038c43.Description: Standard-issue threading protection tube for SOK-12.

577d128124597739d65d0e56.Name: Burris FastFire Weaver Base
577d128124597739d65d0e56.Description: This base from Burris allows to mount the compact FastFire Series Sights to a Weaver or Picatinny-style rail.

576a63cd2459771e796e0e11.Name: Polymer Izhmekh pistol grip for MP-443
576a63cd2459771e796e0e11.Description: Standard service pistol grip for MP-443 manufactured by Izhmekh.

576169e62459773c69055191.Name: SOK-12 polymer handguard Sb.7-1
576169e62459773c69055191.Description: The Sb.7-1 is a standard polymer handguard with sling swivel installed on SOK-12 and SOK-12S.

5751a89d24597722aa0e8db0.Name: Golden Star Balm
5751a89d24597722aa0e8db0.Description: Famous Vietnamese Golden Star Balm, also known as Cao Sao Vang is made from essential oils like Camphor, Menthol, Peppermint, Cajuput. Balm for external use: a small amount of it is applied to the sub-district and rubbing of the skin: for headache - the temples and the nape of the neck, with a cold - under the nostrils, the common cold - in the chest, back, abdomen, insect bites - on the place of bite. Precautions and special instructions: Intended for external use only.

576165642459773c7a400233.Name: Saiga 12ga ver. 10 12/76 shotgun
576165642459773c7a400233.Description: Semi-automatic 12ga shotgun with folding stock and firing mechanism safety lock that only allows firing from extended stock position. Features short 430mm barrel.

5780cf9e2459777df90dcb73.Name: Dorm room 218 Key
5780cf9e2459777df90dcb73.Description: A dorm room key with 218 tag on it.

5780d0652459777df90dcb74.Name: Cabinet key
5780d0652459777df90dcb74.Description: The gas station manager's office key

5780d07a2459777de4559324.Name: Portable cabin key
5780d07a2459777de4559324.Description: A key to one of the portable on-site cabins, probably the one that is used by guards.

5780cf722459777a5108b9a1.Name: Dorm room 308 Key
5780cf722459777a5108b9a1.Description: A dorm room key with 308 tag on it.

5780cfa52459777dfb276eb1.Name: Dorm room 220 Key
5780cfa52459777dfb276eb1.Description: A dorm room key with 220 tag on it.

577d141e24597739c5255e01.Name: Burris FastFire 3 Reflex Sight
577d141e24597739c5255e01.Description: Light  and  tough,  the  FastFire  series  puts an  unmistakable,  bright  red  dot  on  your target  to  give  you  an  immediate  speed and  accuracy  advantage.  Can  be  used  as  a  primary sight or paired on top of an existing sight.

576a7c512459771e796e0e17.Name: B-8 mount
576a7c512459771e796e0e17.Description: B-8 rail mount is installed on Yarygin pistol (MP-443 Grach and its civilian version MP-446 Viking) for use with additional attachments, e.g. 2KS Klesch Mini tactical laser flashlight.

5780cf942459777df90dcb72.Name: Dorm room 214 Key
5780cf942459777df90dcb72.Description: A dorm room key with 214 tag on it.

57616ca52459773c69055192.Name: Izhmash SOK-12 АК type stock
57616ca52459773c69055192.Description: Izhmash-made folding polymer AK-styled stock for SOK-12.

577e1c9d2459773cd707c525.Name: Printer paper
577e1c9d2459773cd707c525.Description: Office-grade paper for printers and copiers, it can nevertheless be used for writing as well, just like any paper.

5780cf692459777de4559321.Name: Dorm room 315 Key
5780cf692459777de4559321.Description: A dorm room key with 315 tag on it.

57838ad32459774a17445cd2.Name: Special Sniper Rifle VSS Vintorez
57838ad32459774a17445cd2.Description: VSS (Vintovka Sniperskaya Specialnaya, Special Sniper Rifle) - suppressed sniper rifle with integral suppressor, designed in the 80s in TSNIITochMash Institute for the needs of special-purpose teams and task forces.

578395e82459774a0e553c7b.Name: TSNIITochMash VSS Vintorez stock
578395e82459774a0e553c7b.Description: Wooden VSS Vintorez stock produced by TSNIITochMash/

57838e1b2459774a256959b1.Name: VSS Vintorez Standard Rearsight
57838e1b2459774a256959b1.Description: Standard mechanical vertically adjustable rear sight for VSS Vintorez.

57838c962459774a1651ec63.Name: VSS 9x39 integral barrel-suppressor
57838c962459774a1651ec63.Description: TSNIITochMash-manufactured integral barrel-suppressor module for VSS Vintorez.

5780cf7f2459777de4559322.Name: Marked key
5780cf7f2459777de4559322.Description: Key with strange symbol scratched on it.

5780d0532459777a5108b9a2.Name: Customs office key
5780d0532459777a5108b9a2.Description: Key to the Customs office building

578395402459774a256959b5.Name: VSS Vintorez dust cover
578395402459774a256959b5.Description: Standard steel VSS Vintorez top dust cover by TSNIITochMash.

5798a2832459774b53341029.Name: Customs plan
5798a2832459774b53341029.Description: A plan of the vast Customs premises, maybe not the most up-to date, but still better than nothing.

57838f0b2459774a256959b2.Name: 10-round 6L24 9x39 VSS magazine
57838f0b2459774a256959b2.Description: 10-round polymer TSNIITochMash 6L24 magazine for 9x39 VSS ammo.

57a3459f245977764a01f703.Name: B-3 mount
57a3459f245977764a01f703.Description: B-3 mounts are fixed on the VSS or VAL suppressor to form a Picatinny rail for installation of additional weapon equipment.

57aca93d2459771f2c7e26db.Name: ELCAN SpecterDR 1x/4x Scope FDE
57aca93d2459771f2c7e26db.Description: The SpecterDR (Dual Role) 1x/4x scope from Specter scope series designed by ELCAN has marked a breakthrough in the optic sight development by becoming the first variable scope that truly has two work modes, switching from 4x magnification to 1x in one touch.

57838f9f2459774a150289a0.Name: 20-round 6L25 9x39 VSS magazine
57838f9f2459774a150289a0.Description: 20-round polymer TSNIITochMash 6L25 magazine for 9x39 VSS and AS VAL ammo.

57acb6222459771ec34b5cb0.Name: Pilad 043-02 Mount
57acb6222459771ec34b5cb0.Description: Aluminium sight support with Picatinny rail mount for installation of scopes and accessories.

57af48872459771f0b2ebf11.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip FDE
57af48872459771f0b2ebf11.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57a349b2245977762b199ec7.Name: Door key
57a349b2245977762b199ec7.Description: Old key, apparently even Soviet-made, most likely it's from administration building doors.

57ac965c24597706be5f975c.Name: ELCAN SpecterDR 1x/4x Scope
57ac965c24597706be5f975c.Description: The SpecterDR (Dual Role) 1x/4x scope from Specter scope series designed by ELCAN has marked a breakthrough in the optic sight development by becoming the first variable scope that truly has two work modes, switching from 4x magnification to 1x in one touch.

57a0dfb82459774d3078b56c.Name: 9x39 mm SP-5
57a0dfb82459774d3078b56c.Description: A sniper cartridge manufactured with high accuracy, has a bullet with a steel core. To engage targets protected by 1-3 class armor.

57ade1442459771557167e15.Name: Armacon Baskak stock
57ade1442459771557167e15.Description: Russian-made light tube stock of very spartan design for use with AK systems that can be installed both on Mil-Spec and Com-Spec M/AR standard receiver adaptors. Not compatible with AR systems!

57adff4f24597737f373b6e6.Name: Sig BRAVO4 4X30 Scope
57adff4f24597737f373b6e6.Description: Designed by Sig, BRAVO4 4X30 optical scope sight features the uniquely large FOV, 43% wider than closest competitors. It also has an extra rail mount on top of it that allows installation of backup compact sight.

57c44b372459772d2b39b8ce.Name: AS VAL
57c44b372459772d2b39b8ce.Description: AS VAL (Avtomat Specialniy, Special Automatic Rifle) - silenced automatic rifle with integral suppressor designed for special forces units. Developed in TSNIITochMash on the VSS Vintorez platform.

579204f224597773d619e051.Name: PM (t) 9x18PM pistol
579204f224597773d619e051.Description: A semi-mythical PM with extended barrel and suppressor mount threading. Some claim it was a limited series manufactured in Bulgaria, others insist on DDR, and some are even prone to think of it as a handcrafted upgrade. How did it end up in the Norvinsk region, no living soul can tell.

57ae0171245977343c27bfcf.Name: Belomo PK-06 reflex sight
57ae0171245977343c27bfcf.Description: Open reflex sight with automatic reticle brightness adjustment and switching between 3 reticle types.

57cff947245977638e6f2a19.Name: Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD (Black) for AK
57cff947245977638e6f2a19.Description: The Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

57c55efc2459772d2c6271e7.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip Black
57c55efc2459772d2c6271e7.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57c55f112459772d28133310.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip Ghillie Green
57c55f112459772d28133310.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57c5ac0824597754771e88a9.Name: Optical scope March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP
57c5ac0824597754771e88a9.Description: March Tactical 3-24x42 First Focal Plane scope, reliable and accurate with ammunition of any power.

57c44f4f2459772d2c627113.Name: AS VAL Dust cover
57c44f4f2459772d2c627113.Description: Standard AS VAL dust cover manufactured by TSNIITochMash.

57cffb66245977632f391a99.Name: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip
57cffb66245977632f391a99.Description: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip. Can only be installed on Magpul licensed M-LOK slot on the applicable equipment.

57c55f172459772d27602381.Name: Hogue OverMolded Rubber Grip OD Green
57c55f172459772d27602381.Description: Fibergalss, rubber-overmolded anti-slip pistol grip for AR systems.

57c69dd424597774c03b7bbc.Name: 30mm Scope mount
57c69dd424597774c03b7bbc.Description: Universal 30mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails.

57a0e5022459774d1673f889.Name: 9x39 mm SP-6
57a0e5022459774d1673f889.Description: Armor-piercing modification of the cartridge SP-5. It is a cartridge with a half-shell bullet with a core of high-carbon steel. It allows you to confidently hit targets protected by bulletproof vests up to 4 class of protection inclusive at a distance of up to 50 meters.

57cffcd624597763133760c5.Name: Magpul M-LOK AFG (Flat Dark Earth) Tactical grip
57cffcd624597763133760c5.Description: Magpul M-LOK AFG Tactical grip. Can only be installed on Magpul licensed M-LOK slot on the applicable equipment.

57cffddc24597763133760c6.Name: Magpul MOE AKM HAND GUARD (Flat Dark Earth) for AK

Both hunters and armed forces operatives value it for small size and weight, which are particularly noticeable over long missions. The model 3-0 features a two-dot reticle of 1 MOA.

Simonov Semi-Automatic Carbine SKS 7.62x39 Hunting Rifle
Version
587e02ff24597743df3deaeb.Description:
Molot OP-SKS Carbine is designed for loading with 7,62×39 — the most popular ammunition. The weight and dimensions make the carbine ergonomic for shooters of any age and height.
It has been used for all types of traditional Russian hunting for more than 50 years. Tested on predators in Africa, Southeast Asia, Central America, Middle East.

Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear.

58d2946c86f7744e271174b5.Description: Drop-in replacement buttstock for AR15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear.

590c346786f77423e50ed342.Name: Xenomorph sealing foam
590c346786f77423e50ed342.Description: Xenomorph is a sealing foam with an excellent structure of cells and high mechanical strength. Easy to use, applied with a thin applicator tube. Foam is an expandable material that doubles its volume on solidification. Has excellent adhesion to most building materials such as wood, concrete, stone, metal, etc. This product does not contain any chloro-fluoro-carbon propellants. A reliable and cost-effective solution for sealing and filling the voids.

5909e99886f7740c983b9984.Name: USB Adapter
5909e99886f7740c983b9984.Description: Battery charger with USB output. Used to be an indispensable household item.

5900b89686f7744e704a8747.Name: Woods Plan
5900b89686f7744e704a8747.Description: Paper plan of priozeskaya protected area

590a386e86f77429692b27ab.Name: Damaged hard drive
590a386e86f77429692b27ab.Description: Random access storage device (information storage device), based on the magnetic recording principle. Serves as the main data drive in most computers. From broken disks, hardware specialists salvage the controllers and magnets for re-use in other electronics.

590a3c0a86f774385a33c450.Name: Spark plug
590a3c0a86f774385a33c450.Description: Gasoline internal combustion engines use spark plugs. Ignition of the fuel-air mixture is produced by electric discharge with a voltage of several thousand or tens of thousands of volts, emerging between the electrodes. The plug fires on each round, at one point of the engine operating cycle.

590a3d9c86f774385926e510.Name: Ultraviolet lamp
590a3d9c86f774385926e510.Description: UV lamp for household use is a type of light bulb which source of light is invisible to the human eye, located on the border of the purple spectrum and x-ray radiation. UV radiation has beneficial effects on all the systems of human and animal bodies, contributing to the development of a strong defensive system against viral and infectious diseases, such as seasonal colds.

590a373286f774287540368b.Name: Dry fuel
590a373286f774287540368b.Description: Dry fuel - in household use it is commonly referred to as dry alcohol. Dry fuel consists of urotropine pressed with a small amount of wax. Typically used for heating or cooking food in field conditions by tourists, military and rescue organizations.

590c62a386f77412b0130255.Name: Sliderkey Secure Flash drive
590c62a386f77412b0130255.Description: Sliderkey Secure Flash drive Such USB sticks are frequently used by TerraGroup brass. They can definitely contain sensitive data.

590c5a7286f7747884343aea.Name: Gunpowder "Kite"
590c5a7286f7747884343aea.Description: Tin with gunpowder. An essential resource for creating cartridges.The composition of the Kite gunpowder is distinguished by the use of pyroxylin with the presence of graphite, which is necessary to reduce the electrification of the mixture.

590a358486f77429692b2790.Name: Rechargeable battery
590a358486f77429692b2790.Description: Chemical source of electric current, reusable source of voltage, characterized by the reversibility of internal chemical processes that ensures its repeated cyclic use (via charge-discharge) for energy accumulation and autonomous power supply of various electrical devices and equipment, as well as providing backup power sources in medicine, manufacturing and other areas.

590c31c586f774245e3141b2.Name: A pack of nails

590c2c9c86f774245b1f03f2.Description: Tool designed to measure length. Indispensable in construction and renovation.

590a3cd386f77436f20848cb.Description: Electric lamp with substantially greater luminous efficiency (the ratio of luminous flux and power consumption), for example, in comparison with filament lamps which are still rather common. Thanks to that, the replacement of incandescent light bulbs with energy-saving ones saves energy, protecting the environment.

Protective helmets Kolpak-1 are recommended by the Interdepartmental Commission for equipping units of the patrol service, traffic police, OMON and other special units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia.

5af04c0b86f774138708f78e.Name: Motor Controller
5af04c0b86f774138708f78e.Description: Motor controllers have been developed for use on weapons stations or main battle tanks. 5af04e0a86f7743a532b79e2.Name: Single-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscope
5af04e0a86f7743a532b79e2.Description:
Single and dual-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscopes (FOG) have been developed for high-performance military applications and are of the highest quality. The FOGs provide compensated yaw rates to the synchronous Integrated Bus for Intelligent Sensors (IBIS) or the asynchronous RS-422 interface.

Developed for use in particularly harsh environments, the gyroscopes can withstand extreme shock and vibration in accordance with MIL-STD-810 ground mobile use, are fully digitized, include on-line BIT, and have no moving parts.

5b099bf25acfc4001637e683.Name: Buffer Tube adapter for SA-58
5b099bf25acfc4001637e683.Description: Adapter for installation of telescopic stock buffer tubes on SA-58.

5b1fa9b25acfc40018633c01.Name: GLOCK 18C 9x19 pistol
5b1fa9b25acfc40018633c01.Description: The Glock 18 is a selective-fire variant of the Glock 17. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round-capacity magazine, although other magazines from the Glock 17 can be used, with available capacities of 10, 17, or 19 rounds. It has a keyhole opening cut into the forward portion of the slide, similar to the opening on the Glock long-slide models, although the Glock 18 has a standard-length slide. The keyhole opening provides an area to allow the four, progressively larger (from back to front) compensator cuts machined into the barrel to vent the propellant gases upwards, affording more control over the rapid-firing machine pistol.

5af0484c86f7740f02001f7f.Name: Coffee Majaica
5af0484c86f7740f02001f7f.Description: 100% Arabica Coffee Majaica - can be stored for a long time without losing a flavor.

5b0bbe4e5acfc40dc528a72d.Name: DS Arms SA-58 7.62x51
5b0bbe4e5acfc40dc528a72d.Description: SA-58 OSW (Operations Specialist Weapon) manufactured by American company DSA (David Selvaggio Arms) is a legal copy of the FAL, its made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. It may come with a different barrel length, an aluminum-alloy lower receiver, and improved Glass-filled Nylon furniture. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 750 rounds/minute. The DSA-58 can use any metric-measurement FAL magazines.

5b3b713c5acfc4330140bd8d.Description: A legendary pistol. It has seen numerous military conflicts and is still being in service in the certain spots of our planet, in one modification or another. This one is a classic TT-33, the most mass-produced version. It features Browning short-recoil tilting-barrel system, but very different otherwise - purposefully simple, single-action, no safety measures except half cock notch, it is able to withstand horrible operating abuse. Thanks to powerful 7.62x25 cartridge and relatively long barrel, TT boasts high muzzle velocity, penetration and impressive accuracy, even over long distances. Special gold edition.

The Improved Outer Tactical Vest (IOTV) Gen IV is designed to permit maximum freedom of movement required to assume correct firing positions with the agility to execute and maneuver tasks. Optimal design characteristics ensure the best possible weight distribution of both the ballistic body armor system as well as additional load bearing equipment, thus providing enhanced comfort, wear duration, and mobility.

5b4c72b386f7745b453af9c0.Description: Motor controllers have been developed for use on weapons stations or main battle tanks. The system power, I/O, performance and assembly have been designed for the most demanding dynamics and precision requirements and can be easily modified. Motor controller includes EMI filtering, power electronics, embedded system software, control algorithm, a common service tool, and the electrical interfaces required.

5b4c72fb86f7745cef1cffc5.Name: Single-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscope
5b4c72fb86f7745cef1cffc5.Description:
Single and dual-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscopes (FOG) have been developed for high-performance military applications and are of the highest quality. The FOGs provide compensated yaw rates to the synchronous Integrated Bus for Intelligent Sensors (IBIS) or the asynchronous RS-422 interface.

Developed for use in particularly harsh environments, the gyroscopes can withstand extreme shock and vibration in accordance with MIL-STD-810 ground mobile use, are fully digitized, include on-line BIT, and have no moving parts.

5c0e533786f7747fa23f4d47.Description: Military issue drug. Inhibits activators of profibrinolysin and slows down its transformation in fibrinolysin. Temporarily stops the bleeding and increases resistance to bloodloss. Has side effects. Leads to severe dehydration

5c0e2f26d174af02a9625114.Name: Upper receiver ADAR 2-15 5.56x45 for 2-15 assault rifle
5c0e2f26d174af02a9625114.Description: Upper receiver for ADAR 2-15 assault rifle manufactured by ADAR. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

5c0d591486f7744c505b416f.Name: 12x70 RIP
5c0d591486f7744c505b416f.Description: RIP (Radically Invasive Projectile) ammunition is a devastatingly effective choice for the anti-personnel use. This 12 cal ammo features a precision-machined solid copper lead-free projectile designed to produce huge damage to body.

5c0e2f94d174af029f650d56.Name: 406mm Molot barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5.56x45
5c0e2f94d174af029f650d56.Description: A Molot barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 406mm long. Regular barrel for ADAR 2-15.

5c0d56a986f774449d5de529.Name: 9x19 mm RIP
5c0d56a986f774449d5de529.Description: RIP (Radically Invasive Projectile) ammunition is a devastatingly effective choice for the anti-personnel use. This 9mm ammo features a precision-machined solid copper lead-free projectile designed to produce huge damage to body.

5c0d32fcd174af02a1659c75.Name: Pyramex Proximity safety glasses
5c0d32fcd174af02a1659c75.Description: Ballistic glasses with impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses.

5c0d5e4486f77478390952fe.Name: 5.45x39 mm 7N39 "Igolnik"
5c0d5e4486f77478390952fe.Description: An experimental cartridge with an armor piercing bullet. The core of the bullet is peaked from an alloy of tungsten carbide (92%) and cobalt (8%), produced by pressing metal powders, followed by sintering.

5c0e53c886f7747fa54205c7.Name: 6B13 assault armor (digital flora pattern)
5c0e53c886f7747fa54205c7.Description: Main armored vest for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions.

5c0d688c86f77413ae3407b2.Name: 9x39 mm 7N12 BP
5c0d688c86f77413ae3407b2.Description: To replace the cartridge "SP-6" Tula ammo plant has developed cartridge with an armor-piercing bullet "BP". The cartridge is intended to eliminate manpower protected by personal protective equipment up to the 5th grade of protection. The BP bullet consists of a bimetallic shell with a truncated tip, a steel core and a lead jacket.

5c0e3eb886f7742015526062.Name: 6B5-16 Zh -86 "Uley" armored rig
5c0e3eb886f7742015526062.Description: The bulletproof vest 6B5 was adopted by the armed forces of the USSR in 1986. Option 6B5-16 is designed to protect against fragments and bullets of fire arms (3rd class protection, titanium). Also has several pouches for magazines and other equipment.

5c0e534186f7747fa1419867.Name: Regenerative stimulant injector eTG-change
5c0e534186f7747fa1419867.Description: Powerful stimulant for regeneration processes. Is used for rapid recovery of a soldier after injury, or during transportation of heavily wounded. Allowed to be used by medical officers and paramedics. Has strong side effects.

5c0e2f5cd174af02a012cfc9.Name: ADAR 2-15 wooden stock for AR-15 and compatibles

5c0e51be86f774598e797894.Name: 6B13 assault armor (flora pattern)
5c0e51be86f774598e797894.Description: Main armored vest for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions.

5c0e531286f7747fa54205c2.Name: Combat stimulant injector SJ1 TGLabs
5c0e531286f7747fa54205c2.Description: Combat stimulant. Is used for gaining strength and endurance before combat. Decreases sensation of pain. Stimulant is allowed to use by the special forces units. Developed by Terra Group Labs, marked as SJ1. Has side effects

5c0e446786f7742013381639.Name: 6B5-15 Zh -86 "Uley" armored rig
5c0e446786f7742013381639.Description: The bulletproof vest 6B5 was adopted by the armed forces of the USSR in 1986. Option 6B5-15 is designed for assault units (4 class protection, boron carbide). Also has several pouches for magazines and other equipment.

5c110624d174af029e69734c.Name: T-7 Thermal Goggles with Night Vision Mounts
5c110624d174af029e69734c.Description: The T-7 thermal imaging binocular/ goggles takes a clever approach to individual soldier imaging systems. The T-7 thermal binocular brings the best features of the night vision goggles and adapted them into a full function thermal imager.

5c0e541586f7747fa54205c9.Name: 6B13 M assault armor (tan)
5c0e541586f7747fa54205c9.Description: Personally modified by Killa 6B13. Ceramic armored plates replaced with lightweight polyethylene plates. The protection class is higher, the weight is less.

5c1127bdd174af44217ab8b9.Name: 20 pcs. 9x19 mm DIPP ammo box
5c1127bdd174af44217ab8b9.Description: Cardboard box of 9x19 mm DIPP ammo, 20 rounds.

5c0e57ba86f7747fa141986d.Name: 6B23-2 armor (mountain flora pattern)
5c0e57ba86f7747fa141986d.Description: Main armored vest Zabralo-8 for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions.

5c0e530286f7747fa1419862.Name: Propital
5c0e530286f7747fa1419862.Description: Military issue drug. It stimulates regeneration processes by increasing the biosynthesis of purine and pyrimidine bases, RNA, functional and enzymatic cell elements. Increases metabolism, health and vitality. It has long-term side effects. Permitted to use only by medical officers and paramedics.

5c1262a286f7743f8a69aab2.Name: 30 pcs. 5.45x39 7N39 ammo pack
5c1262a286f7743f8a69aab2.Description: A paper package of 5.45x39 7N39 "Igolnik" cartridges, 30 pieces.

5c12613b86f7743bbe2c3f76.Name: Folder with intelligence
5c12613b86f7743bbe2c3f76.Description: A folder with various documents that can be very useful and valuable to third parties.

5c0e5edb86f77461f55ed1f7.Name: Zhuk-3 Press armor
5c0e5edb86f77461f55ed1f7.Description: An armored vest of the 3rd class of protection for the journalists working in combat zones

5c0e625a86f7742d77340f62.Name: Zhuk-6a heavy armor
5c0e625a86f7742d77340f62.Description: 6 class protection armor vest designed for assault units

5c0e655586f774045612eeb2.Name: Highcom Trooper TFO armor (multicam)
5c0e655586f774045612eeb2.Description: Plate vest from Highcom, popular among USEC PMCs. Lightweight AR500 4th-grade protection plates cover only the chest and back areas.

5c12688486f77426843c7d32.Name: Paracord
5c12688486f77426843c7d32.Description: A lightweight polymeric cord made of nylon, originally used in parachute slings. Paracord can be used for many other purposes, both military and civilian.

5c1265fc86f7743f896a21c2.Name: Broken GPhone X
5c1265fc86f7743f896a21c2.Description: The last thing that Wepple managed to release on the smartphone market. Broken and unusable, but containing a lot of useful components.

5c0e66e2d174af02a96252f4.Name: SLAAP armor Plate (Tan)
5c0e66e2d174af02a96252f4.Description: Additional armor for the Ops-Core FAST helmet, made of a special polyethylene plate (5th protection class).

5c0e5bab86f77461f55ed1f3.Name: 6B23-1 armor (digital flora pattern)
5c0e5bab86f77461f55ed1f3.Description: Main armored vest Zabralo-8 for personnel of combat units of the ground forces, airborne troops, marines, etc. The vest is designed to protect vital organs from being hit by firearms, shell fragments, mines, grenades, and cold weapons, reducing the severity of armor contusion injury when performing combat missions.

5c0fa877d174af02a012e1cf.Name: Water bottle with a filter Aquamari
5c0fa877d174af02a012e1cf.Description: Purified and enriched water in bottle with a  CR-100 filter 0.6L.

5c0e774286f77468413cc5b2.Name: Mystery Ranch Blackjack 50 backpack (multicam)
5c0e774286f77468413cc5b2.Description: Backpack for long, far and successful raids by Mystery Ranch.

5c0e722886f7740458316a57.Name: ANA Tactical M1 armored rig
5c0e722886f7740458316a57.Description: Tactical rig with additional 4-class armor plates. The vest is created with the use of the best experience of Russian special forces operators. The versatility of the system makes it possible to use this vest both when carrying out city tasks and when performing tasks on rough terrain. Equipped with additional pouches.

5c0e6a1586f77404597b4965.Name: Belt-A + Belt-B gear rig
5c0e6a1586f77404597b4965.Description: Belt-A is the legendary rig of the Afghan war era. This gear was adopted in 1989, the GRU Special Forces used it until the beginning of 2000-th, along with the added Belt-B with 10 pouches for VOG grenades.

5c0faeddd174af02a962601f.Name: ADAR buffer tube
5c0faeddd174af02a962601f.Description: ADAR Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

5c0e842486f77443a74d2976.Name: Maska 1Sch face shield (Killa)
5c0e842486f77443a74d2976.Description: Special faceshield for Maska 1Sch helmet. Art design by Killa.

5c0e746986f7741453628fe5.Name: Wartech TV-110 plate carrier
5c0e746986f7741453628fe5.Description: Plate carrier with armor plates made of armored steel (class 4) with chest and back protection only. And is equipped with set of pouches.

5c0e805e86f774683f3dd637.Name: 3V G Paratus 3-Day Operator's Tactical Backpack
5c0e805e86f774683f3dd637.Description: Modular backpack for PMC operators with special capabilities and internal organization of space.

5c0e9f2c86f77432297fe0a3.Name: Blackhawk! Commando Chest Harness (black)
5c0e9f2c86f77432297fe0a3.Description: Designed for comfort and quick access this harness puts a lot of additional magazines at your fingertips

5c1127d0d174af29be75cf68.Name: 5 pcs. 12x70 DIPP ammo box
5c1127d0d174af29be75cf68.Description: Cardboard box of 12x70 DIPP ammo, 5 rounds.

5c0e874186f7745dc7616606.Name: Maska 1Sch helmet (Killa)
5c0e874186f7745dc7616606.Description: Helmet "Mask-1" appeared in service in 1991, as a replacement for the "Sphere". Killa's personal helmet.

5c0faf68d174af02a96260b8.Name: ADAR 2-15 charging handle for AR-15
5c0faf68d174af02a96260b8.Description: Standard charging handle for ADAR 2-15 and compatible systems.

5c11046cd174af02a012e42b.Name: Wilcox Interface for PVS-7
5c11046cd174af02a012e42b.Description: Wilcox NVG Interface Shoe for the AN/PVS-7B/7D is designed to replace the plastic shoes provided with a variety of Night Vision Devices.

5c10c8fd86f7743d7d706df3.Name: Adrenaline injector
5c10c8fd86f7743d7d706df3.Description: Sterile disposable syringe with a dose of adrenaline - the main hormone of the adrenal medulla. It is used to enhance the physiological response associated with the preparation of all muscles to increased activity. Temporarily boosts strength, endurance. Relieves the sensation of pain.

5c12301c86f77419522ba7e4.Name: False flash drive
5c12301c86f77419522ba7e4.Description: Specially prepared flash drive containing false data about the movement of shipments.

5c12620d86f7743f8b198b72.Name: Tetriz portable game
5c12620d86f7743f8b198b72.Description: An ancient artifact of a lost past. The Mechanic seems to exchange it for bitcoin.

5c1267ee86f77416ec610f72.Name: Chain with Prokill medallion
5c1267ee86f77416ec610f72.Description: Chain with the Prokill medallion. The attribute of the Contract Wars, and now - a relic.

5c6c2c9c2e2216000f2002e4.Description: Troy industries carbon fiber M-LOK foregrip for 416A5 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5c6d710d2e22165df16b81e7.Description: WarComp flash hider for AR-15 produced by Surefire.

5c6d11072e2216000e69d2e4.Description: Midwest M-LOK foregrip for 416A5 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5c6d42cb2e2216000e69d7d1.Name: HK Polymer mag 30 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magazine
5c6d42cb2e2216000e69d7d1.Description: 30-round polymer HK Polymer mag magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition.

5c6d46132e221601da357d56.Name: TROY Battlemag 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magazine
5c6d46132e221601da357d56.Description: 30-round polymer TROY Battlemag magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition.

5c6beec32e221601da3578f2.Name: TJ Custom 9x19 Compensator
5c6beec32e221601da3578f2.Description: Compensator produced by TJ Custom for Sig-Sauer P226 pistols.

5c6d5d8b2e221644fc630b39.Name: Stngr Vypr 10" M-LOK foregrip for AR15
5c6d5d8b2e221644fc630b39.Description: Stngr Vypr foregrip for AR-15 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5c6d450c2e221600114c997d.Name: HK PM Gen.2 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magazine
5c6d450c2e221600114c997d.Description: 30-round polymer HK PM Gen.2 magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition.

5c6bf4aa2e2216001219b0ae.Name: US Palm pistol grip for AK
5c6bf4aa2e2216001219b0ae.Description: Light pistol grip for a AK, produced by US Palm.

5c6d85e02e22165df16b81f4.Name: 10.6" barrel for 416A5 and compatible 5.56x45
5c6d85e02e22165df16b81f4.Description: A barrel for 416 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 264mm long.

5c6d7b3d2e221600114c9b7d.Name: HK Grip V.2 pistol grip for AR-15 based systems
5c6d7b3d2e221600114c9b7d.Description: HK Grip V.2 pistol grip can be installed at any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips.

5c78f2612e221600114c9f0d.Name: SAI 10" QD Rail foregrip for AR15
5c78f2612e221600114c9f0d.Description: Salinet Arms QD Rail foregrip for AR-15 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5c78f26f2e221601da3581d1.Name: Magpul MOE SL mid length M-LOK foregrip for AR15
5c78f26f2e221601da3581d1.Description: Magpul MOE SL foregrip for AR-15 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5c78f2492e221600114c9f04.Name: SAI 14.5" QD Rail foregrip for AR15
5c78f2492e221600114c9f04.Description: Salinet Arms QD Rail foregrip for AR-15 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5c78f2792e221600106f4683.Name: Magpul MOE SL carbine length M-LOK foregrip for AR-15
5c78f2792e221600106f4683.Description: Magpul MOE SL foregrip for AR-15 equipped with a M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

5c7954d52e221600106f4cc7.Name: Direct Thread Mount adapter for Gemtech ONE.
5c7954d52e221600106f4cc7.Description: Direct Thread Mount adapter for installation of Gemtech ONE silencer directly onto the barrel threading.

5c7955c22e221644f31bfd5e.Name: Gemtech ONE 7.62x51 Sound Suppressor
5c7955c22e221644f31bfd5e.Description: Gemtech ONE sound suppressor designed for use with a 7.62x51 NATO, but also compatible with most popular rifle calibers. Can only be installed on compatible devices.

5c78f2882e22165df16b832e.Name: SAI Jail Break 5.56x45 for AR-15
5c78f2882e22165df16b832e.Description: Jaik Break muzzle device produced by Salient Arms. Can be installed only on a Salient Arms handguards.

5c793fc42e221600114ca25d.Name: SI Advanced receiver extension buffer tube (anodized red)
5c793fc42e221600114ca25d.Description: Strike Industries Advanced receiver extension Buffer Tube, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine or rifle.

5c7d55de2e221644f31bff68.Name: Aimpoint COMP M4 reflex sight
5c7d55de2e221644f31bff68.Description: The Aimpoint CompM4 series of sights are the toughest sights that Aimpoint has ever produced and they are the standard infantry soldier sight in many NATO countries. These optics are extremely rugged and operate continuously for up to 8 years using a single AA battery. The Aimpoint CompM4s is the latest version of the U.S. Army's M68CCO (Close-Combat Optic), continuing a legacy that Aimpoint has maintained since 1997.

5c7951452e221644f31bfd5c.Name: Venom Antidote muzzle brake & compensator for АК
5c7951452e221644f31bfd5c.Description: Muzzle brake compensator Antidote by Venom is designed for installation on classic AK-based weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the barrel climb.

5c7fc87d2e221644f31c0298.Name: BCM MOD.3 Tactical grip
5c7fc87d2e221644f31c0298.Description: Lightweight polymer tactical grip produced by BCM.

5c793fb92e221644f31bfb64.Name: SI Advanced receiver extension buffer tube
5c793fb92e221644f31bfb64.Description: Strike Industries Advanced receiver extension Buffer Tube, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine or rifle.

5c791e872e2216001219c40a.Name: SI "Cobra tactical" tactical grip
5c791e872e2216001219c40a.Description: The Cobra tactical vertical grip integrates the form with functionality. Its hybrid-designed shape works both as a regular foregrip and as a comfortable hand stop when going with the thumb over method.  The grip allows you to handle the weapon with the confidence and the organic design enables the operator to manipulate the rifle in a way that’s most comfortable at any given moment.

5c878e9d2e2216000f201903.Name: Lantac Dragon 7.62x51 muzzle brake
5c878e9d2e2216000f201903.Description: Muzzle brake Dragon by Lantac is designed for installation on 7.62x51 weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the barrel climb.

5c793fde2e221601da358614.Name: SI Viper Mod.1 Stock
5c793fde2e221601da358614.Description: Viper Mod.1 telescopic stock designed and produced by Strike industries.

5c82342f2e221644f31c060e.Name: Zenit-Belomo PSO 1 4x24 scope
5c82342f2e221644f31c060e.Description: Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2-1, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.

5c7d55f52e221644f31bff6a.Name: Aimpoint LRP mount for COMP M4 sights.
5c7d55f52e221644f31bff6a.Description: Aimpoint LRP is a QD base mount for COMP M4 sights.

5c7e5f112e221600106f4ede.Name: AAC Blackout 51T 5.56x45 flash-hider
5c7e5f112e221600106f4ede.Description: Advenced Armament Corp. - Blackout 51T 5.56x45 flash-hider is an effective flash suppressor that also serves as a platform for attaching a 762 SDN-6 sound suppressor. Can be Installed on weapons based on AR-15.

5c7d560b2e22160bc12c6139.Name: Standard Spacer for Aimpont sight
5c7d560b2e22160bc12c6139.Description: Raises mount for Aimpoint Comp series sight.

5c7e8fab2e22165df16b889b.Name: AAC Illusion 9 9x19mm silencer
5c7e8fab2e22165df16b889b.Description: Illusion 9 is a compact, high performance silencer for modern 9mm semi-automatic pistols. Made by Advanced Armament Corp.

5c86592b2e2216000e69e77c.Name: 34mm one piece magmount made by I-E-A Mil Optics
5c86592b2e2216000e69e77c.Description: I-E-A Mil Optics KH/F is a universal 34mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails.

5c7fb51d2e2216001219ce11.Name: Surefire SF3P 5.56x45 Flash hider for AR-15
5c7fb51d2e2216001219ce11.Description: The advanced SureFire SF3P-556 three-prong flash hider, which fits M4/M16 weapons and variants, features a greatly reduces muzzle flash. The SF3P-556 also serves as a rock-solid mounting adapter for SureFire SOCOM Series 5.56 mm Fast-Attach suppressors.

5c82343a2e221644f31c0611.Name: Zenit-Belomo PSO 1M2 4x24 scope
5c82343a2e221644f31c0611.Description: Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for precision sight fire with Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.

5c87ca002e221600114cb150.Name: KAC Vertical pistol grip
5c87ca002e221600114cb150.Description: Vertical pistol grip produced by Knights armament.

5c88f24b2e22160bc12c69a6.Name: 20-round SVD 7.62x54 magazine
5c88f24b2e22160bc12c69a6.Description: 20-round steel Izhmash SVD magazine, for the SVD-based rifles, for 7.62x54 ammo.

5c87a07c2e2216001219d4a2.Name: HK E1 Stock for AR-15 and compatible
5c87a07c2e2216001219d4a2.Description: Telescopic stock E1 designed and produced by Heckler and Koch.

5c878ebb2e2216001219d48a.Name: Lantac Drakon 7.62x39 muzzle brake & compensator for AK
5c878ebb2e2216001219d48a.Description: Muzzle brake compensator Drakon by Lantac is designed for installation on 7.62x39 AK-based weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the barrel climb.

5c9a25172e2216000f20314e.Name: Daniel Defence RIS II 12.25 foregrip for AR-15-compatible systems
5c9a25172e2216000f20314e.Description: Daniel Defence RIS II 12.25 foregrip is a part of the SOPMOD Block II program to replace the standard M4CQBR or Mk18 foregrips in the US SOCOM service. Made with light but durable aircraft aluminium alloy. Equipped with 4 mounts for installation of additional devices and accessories. This foregrip option is incompatible with М203 UBGL.

5c9a07572e221644f31c4b32.Name: Magpul Zhukov-U HAND GUARD (Black) for AK
5c9a07572e221644f31c4b32.Description: The Magpul Zhukov-U HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

5c99f3592e221644fc633070.Name: Custom cut mosin stock for TOZ-106
5c99f3592e221644fc633070.Description: Custom stock which was cut from regular mosin rifle stock to fit TOZ-106. It was made by ancient Russian dark magic calls "Napiling".

5c90c3622e221601da359851.Name: B-13V rail platform above reciever "Classic"
5c90c3622e221601da359851.Description: The B-13 rail platform above receiver mounts on the standard Dovetail joint located on the PP-19-01 "Vityaz". Provides a platform for sighting devices.

5ca20ee186f774799474abc2.Name: Vulkan-5 (LShZ-5) heavy helmet
5ca20ee186f774799474abc2.Description: Heavy helmet with a high level of protection "Vulkan-5" is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 6-class head protection from medium to heavy projectiles.

5c9a1c3a2e2216000e69fb6a.Name: Magpul Zhukov-U HAND GUARD (FDE) for AK
5c9a1c3a2e2216000e69fb6a.Description: The Magpul Zhukov-U HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

5c9a1c422e221600106f69f0.Name: Magpul Zhukov-U HAND GUARD (Plum) for AK
5c9a1c422e221600106f69f0.Description: The Magpul Zhukov-U HAND GUARD is installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with licensed M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails.

5ca20abf86f77418567a43f2.Name: Triton M43-A Chest Harness
5ca20abf86f77418567a43f2.Description: Designed to place and carry elements of ammunition and equipment for use in moderate and hot climates.

5c9a26332e2216001219ea70.Name: Daniel Defence FDE RIS II FSP 9.5 foregrip for AR-15-compatible systems
5c9a26332e2216001219ea70.Description: Daniel Defence RIS II FSP 9.5 foregrip is a part of the SOPMOD Block II program to replace the standard M4CQBR or Mk18 foregrips in the US SOCOM service. Made with light but durable aircraft aluminium alloy. Equipped with 4 mounts for installation of additional devices and accessories. This foregrip option is incompatible with М203 UBGL.

5ca2151486f774244a3b8d30.Name: FORT Redut-M body armor
5ca2151486f774244a3b8d30.Description: “Redut M” is a modified version of the Redut well-proven body armor, which is in service of special units of the FSB. The vest is based on advanced technologies in the field of individual armor. Due to the optimized form of armor elements and the outer cover with a special damping-ventilation system, the Redut M armored vest has excellent functional qualities, which facilitates active actions, including those associated with the use of vehicles and in confined spaces.

5cc86832d7f00c000d3a6e6c.Name: 5.7x28 mm R37.F
5cc86832d7f00c000d3a6e6c.Description:
Ready for the next level of FN 57 Defense Ammo from R&R Weapon Systems: R37.F. This FN 57 Defense Ammo has a superior ballistic profile, achieving velocities from 2100/fps up to 2400/fps. Ballistic performance of the R37.F is unique by fragmenting into three razor sharp petals which penetrate 5-7 inche while the base travels 15-17 inches after passing through 4 layers of denim.

This FN 57 Defense Ammo is a 37 grain Fragmenting Copper Hollow Point round. It is CNC Machined pure monolithic copper 99.5%. The projectile is a Violently expanding/fragmenting top with a deep penetrating base. The base penetration is between 15-17 inches, and the petal penetration travels between 5-7 inches in ballistic gel after passing through 4 layers of denim. If you are looking for one of the most devastating FN 5.7 Defense Ammo available for the FN 5.7 and PS90 look no further.

5cc82d76e24e8d00134b4b83.Name: FN P90 5.7x28 submachinegun
5cc82d76e24e8d00134b4b83.Description: The FN P90, also known as the FN Project 1990, is a compact personal defense weapon (PDW) designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. Created in response to NATO requests for a replacement for 9×19mm Parabellum firearms, the P90 was designed as a compact but powerful firearm for vehicle crews, operators of crew-served weapons, support personnel, special forces, and counter-terrorist groups.

5cc86840d7f00c002412c56c.Name: 5.7x28 mm R37.X
5cc86840d7f00c002412c56c.Description:
Ready for the next level of FN 57 Defense Ammo from R&R Weapon Systems: R37.X. This FN 57 Defense Ammo has a superior ballistic profile, achieving velocities from 2100/fps up to 2400/fps. Ballistic performance of the R37.X is unique by expanding into a three tip star shape which has razor sharp petals. This expanded razor sharp projectile travels 12-15 inches after passing through 4 layers of denim.

This FN 57 Defense Ammo is a 37 grain Expanding Copper Hollow Point round. It is CNC Machined pure monolithic copper 99.5%. The projectile is a hollow point that expands to inflict serious damage. If you are looking for one of the most devastating FN 57 Defense Ammo available for the FN 5.7 and PS90 look no further.

5d1b313086f77425227d1678.Description: A device designed to protect an electric motor or electrical installation powered from a three-phase electrical network.

5d1b2fa286f77425227d1674.Name: Electric motor
5d1b2fa286f77425227d1674.Description: A small electromechanical transducer, through which electrical energy is converted into mechanical energy. An indispensable thing at production or engineering.

5d1b2f3f86f774252167a52c.Name: FP-100 filter absorber
5d1b2f3f86f774252167a52c.Description: The filter absorber FP-100 is designed to clean the polluted air of various industries from the chemical industry, radioactive dust and bacterial (biological) aerosols.

5d1b2ffd86f77425243e8d17.Name: NIXXOR lens
5d1b2ffd86f77425243e8d17.Description: Lens for video equipment and security systems.

5d1b385e86f774252167b98a.Name: Water filter
5d1b385e86f774252167b98a.Description: Charcoal water filter used both in production in the food industry and at home. Designed to purify water from harmful impurities.

5d1b33a686f7742523398398.Name: Purified water
5d1b33a686f7742523398398.Description: Enriched, purified water, which is not only tasty, but also good for your health.

5d1b32c186f774252167a530.Name: Analog thermometer
5d1b32c186f774252167a530.Description: Thermometer designed to measure and control the temperature of liquid materials.

5d1b36a186f7742523398433.Name: Metal fuel tank
5d1b36a186f7742523398433.Description: Metal fuel tank for liquid flammable materials.

5d1b376e86f774252519444e.Name: "Fierce Hatchling" moonshine
5d1b376e86f774252519444e.Description: First-class moonshine straight from the hideout. Sixfold distillation, purification, crystallization, and ionization of the boiling process led to the creation of this 79-degree drink. Remember that drinking alcohol can lead to sad consequences.

5d1b39a386f774252339976f.Name: Silicone tube
5d1b39a386f774252339976f.Description: Silicone tube with a 20mm diameter. An indispensable thing in the chemical industry and, in particular, moonshine production.

5d1c774f86f7746d6620f8db.Name: Radiator helix
5d1c774f86f7746d6620f8db.Description: Radiator helix for industrial type heating devices. Under the action of electricity, it heats up and transfers heat to the room using a radiator reflector.

5d1b392c86f77425243e98fe.Name: Light bulb
5d1b392c86f77425243e98fe.Description: Classic incandescent lamp. Fragile, often burns out, shines dim and consumes a lot of electricity.

5d1b371186f774253763a656.Name: Expeditionary fuel tank
5d1b371186f774253763a656.Description: Plastic lightweight expeditionary canister for fuel.

5d1f819086f7744b355c219b.Name: Daniel Defense Wave Muzzle Brake 7.62x51
5d1f819086f7744b355c219b.Description: Daniel Defense Wave is a very effective muzzle brake that also serves as a platform for attaching a QD Wave sound suppressor.

5d1b5e94d7ad1a2b865a96b0.Name: FLIR RS-32 2.25-9x 35mm 60Hz thermal riflescope
5d1b5e94d7ad1a2b865a96b0.Description: Versatile thermal imaging telescope/sight with many uses and advantages. It can be installed on weapons for use as sight, or on the helmet - via adapter - as a monocular, and as a separate observation device.

5d1c819a86f774771b0acd6c.Name: Weapon parts
5d1c819a86f774771b0acd6c.Description: Various parts of the weapon needed to replace broken parts, or for the production of handicraft weapons.

5d1b3a5d86f774252167ba22.Name: Pile of meds
5d1b3a5d86f774252167ba22.Description: Various medicines and drugs, necessary for the production of meds and filling the contents of individual first-aid kits.

5d1b3f2d86f774253763b735.Name: Disposable syringe
5d1b3f2d86f774253763b735.Description: Disposable syringe in individual sterile packaging.

5d235b4d86f7742e017bc88a.Name: GP coin
5d235b4d86f7742e017bc88a.Description: "Админ, накинь ГПшек" is written on this gold coin, which, according to rumors, was actively used as a means of payment for PMC services during the Contract Wars.

5d235bb686f77443f4331278.Name: Small S I C C case
5d235bb686f77443f4331278.Description: A small soft case for storing various small items such as key cards, paper money, and coins, as well as dogtags and metal keys.

5d235a5986f77443f6329bc6.Name: Gold skull ring
5d235a5986f77443f6329bc6.Description: A ring in the shape of a skull, like a real attribute of a goon who has reached success.

5d2369418abbc306c62e0c80.Name: Steiner Dbal PL tactical flashlight
5d2369418abbc306c62e0c80.Description: Steiner Dbal PL combined LED and green laser Weapon Light.

5d25a4a98abbc30b917421a4.Name: 5-round .308 AICS M700 magazine
5d25a4a98abbc30b917421a4.Description: 5-round M700 sniper rifle magazine by Accuracy International, for .308 cartridges.

5d25a6a48abbc306c62e6310.Description: 12-round M700 sniper rifle magazine by Modular Driven Technologies LP., for .308 cartridges.

5d25a6538abbc306c62e630d.Name: 10-round .308 AICS M700 magazine
5d25a6538abbc306c62e630d.Description: 10-round M700 sniper rifle magazine by Accuracy International, for .308 cartridges.

5d2da1e948f035477b1ce2ba.Name: Trijicon SRS-02 reflex sight

5d2c772c48f0355d95672c25.Name: TWS Dog leg rail dust cover for АК
5d2c772c48f0355d95672c25.Description: TWS Dog leg rail dust cover with integrated Picatinny rail is compatible with all models of Kalashnikov automatic rifles and carbines based on AK platform.

5d2f259b48f0355a844acd74.Name: MP5k Polymer handguard

5d2f0d8048f0356c925bc3b0.Description: HK MP5K(K from the German word Kurz - "short") is a shorter version of MP5 which was designed for close quarters battle use by clandestine operations and special services.

5d2f261548f03576f500e7b7.Description: Regular upper receiver for MP5 Kurz manufactured by HK.

5d2f2d5748f03572ec0c0139.Description: Default HK MP5 Kurz cocking handle.

5d2f2ab648f03550091993ca.Name: 12.7x108 mm BZT-44M
5d2f2ab648f03550091993ca.Description: Modernization of the 12.7 BZT-44 cartridge was carried out in the “TsNIITOCHMASH” in the early 1990s. The new cartridge was adopted in 2002 and received the name as a 12.7-mm cartridge with an upgraded armor-piercing incendiary tracer bullet BZT-44M.

5d3eb44aa4b93650d64e4979.Name: Five-seveN MK2 pistol slide
5d3eb44aa4b93650d64e4979.Description: Regular slide for Five-seveN MK2, product by Fabrique Nationale of Herstal.

5d3eb4aba4b93650d64e497d.Name: Five-seveN Standard Rear-sight

5d3eb5b6a4b9361eab311902.Name: Barrel for Five-seveN 5.7x28

5d403f9186f7743cac3f229b.Name: Bottle of Dan Jackiel Whiskey
5d403f9186f7743cac3f229b.Description: The most popular whiskey among the PMCs. The unique filtration of the drink occurs through charcoal obtained from the burning of Samara sugar birch. The drink seems to be alcoholic, and alcohol is harmful. Especially for such a warrior like you.

5d4042a986f7743185265463.Name: Long flat screwdriver
5d4042a986f7743185265463.Description: Long flat screwdriver for installation work in hard to reach places.

5d4405f0a4b9361e6a4e6bd9.Name: Lone Star Ion Lite handguard for AR-15 and compatible
5d4405f0a4b9361e6a4e6bd9.Description: Lightweight handguard Lone Star Ion Lite for use with sport rifles based on AR-15.

5d40407c86f774318526545a.Name: Bottle of vodka Tarkovskaya
5d40407c86f774318526545a.Description: "Tarkovskaya fire water". It is not recommended in principle to use it, alcohol is harmful and all that, but sometimes it is necessary to relax after the battle. No need to raid area 51 to see them aliens after all.

5d40419286f774318526545f.Name: Metal cutting scissors
5d40419286f774318526545f.Description: Special scissors for cutting sheet metal.

5d43021ca4b9362eab4b5e25.Name: Lone Star TX-15 DML Rifle
5d43021ca4b9362eab4b5e25.Description: The TX15 Designated Marksman Light (DML) series sets the standard for a small frame semi-automatic precision rifle. Utilizing lessons learned during the development of our Multi Purpose Carbine, the DML is optimized for mid-range shooting.

5d44069ca4b9361ebd26fc37.Name: Magpul PRS GEN3 stock
5d44069ca4b9361ebd26fc37.Description: PRS GEN3 stock made by Magpul.

5d4405aaa4b9361e6a4e6bd3.Name: Lightweight upper 5.56x45 for TX15 rifle
5d4405aaa4b9361e6a4e6bd3.Description: Upper receiver for TX15 rifle manufactured by Lone Star. Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices.

5d40412b86f7743cb332ac3a.Name: Schaman shampoo
5d40412b86f7743cb332ac3a.Description: Schaman hair detergent with the smell of melon, barbecue and bus station.

5d44064fa4b9361e4f6eb8b5.Name: Thunder Beast Ultra 5 Sound Suppressor
5d44064fa4b9361e4f6eb8b5.Description: Ultra 5 sound suppressor designed for use with a 7.62x51 NATO, but also functions as a superb multi-caliber suppressor for multiple hosts, providing excellent performance on 7.62 NATO, .300 AAC, 6.8 SPC, 6.5, and 5.56mm NATO. Can only be installed on compatible muzzle devices made by Thunder Beast.

5d4041f086f7743cac3f22a7.Name: Ortodontox toothpaste
5d4041f086f7743cac3f22a7.Description: Toothpaste approved by 9 out of 10 dentists. The dentist who did not approve was clearly not in himself, since he recommended shoe polish initially.

5d4aaa73a4b9365392071175.Name: TDI AKM-L handguard for AK Anodized Bronze
5d4aaa73a4b9365392071175.Description: The TDI AKM-L can be installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails. Anodized Bronze.

5d440b9fa4b93601354d480c.Name: 20" barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5.56x45
5d440b9fa4b93601354d480c.Description: A barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 20 inches long.

5d440b93a4b9364276578d4b.Name: 18" barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5.56x45
5d440b93a4b9364276578d4b.Description: A barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 18 inch long.

5d4406a8a4b9361e4f6eb8b7.Name: Magpul PRS GEN3 Grey stock
5d4406a8a4b9361e4f6eb8b7.Description: PRS GEN3 stock made by Magpul. Grey colored model.

5d4aaa54a4b9365392071170.Name: TDI AKM-L handguard for AK Anodized Red
5d4aaa54a4b9365392071170.Description: The TDI AKM-L can be installed on AKM/AK-74 compatible weapon systems. Equipped with M-LOK mounts for installation of additional devices or rails. Anodized Red.

5d44334ba4b9362b346d1948.Name: Raptor charging handle for AR-15 Grey
5d44334ba4b9362b346d1948.Description: Raptor charging handle for AR-15 and compatible systems. Grey colored model.

5d4aab30a4b9365435358c55.Name: VS-24 white handguard with a VS-33c gas block combo for AK
5d4aab30a4b9365435358c55.Description: VS-24 handguard with a VS-33c gas block. Produced by VS. White-colored.

5d443f8fa4b93678dd4a01aa.Name: Thunder Beast 30CB Muzzle Brake 7.62x51
5d443f8fa4b93678dd4a01aa.Description: Thunder Beast 30CB is a effective muzzle brake that also serves as a platform for attaching a QD sound suppressor.

5d5d85c586f774279a21cbdb.Name: Haley Strategic D3CRX Chest Harness
5d5d85c586f774279a21cbdb.Description: The Haley Strategic D3CRX Combat chest rig is one of the most respected PMC rig systems. Ease and comfort of use are supported by the presence of the optimal number of pouches.

5d5d646386f7742797261fd9.Name: 6B3TM-01M armored rig
5d5d646386f7742797261fd9.Description: Modified general army body armor 6B3 under the index 6B3TM-01M. Actively used during the war in Afghanistan. It has a comprehensive titanium 4-class GOST protection and a set of several pouches for magazines and grenades.

5d5d940f86f7742797262046.Name: Oakley Mechanism heavy duty backpack (black)
5d5d940f86f7742797262046.Description: The Mechanism Backpack offers the versatility and durable construction that accommodates any adventure. Heavy-duty metal clips, zips and hook-and-loop closures create secure storage, and a flap-top opening means more room for hauling larger items. A variety of specialized pockets deliver military-style organization and easy access, and padded adjustable shoulder straps keep every excursion comfortable.

5d5d87f786f77427997cfaef.Name: Ars Arma A18 Skanda plate carrier
5d5d87f786f77427997cfaef.Description: Plate carrier with armor plates (class 4) with chest and back protection only. And is equipped with a set of pouches.

5d5e7d28a4b936645d161203.Name: MSA ACH TC-2001 MICH Series Helmet
5d5e7d28a4b936645d161203.Description: The MSA Advanced Combat Helmet (ACH) delivers advanced ballistic, fragmentation,and impact head protection, with comfort for long-term use. The helmet’s low-profile design reduces the risk of interference in target acquisition and ensures compatibility with NVGs and headsets.

5d5e9c74a4b9364855191c40.Name: MSA ACH TC-2002 MICH Series Helmet
5d5e9c74a4b9364855191c40.Description: The MSA Advanced Combat Helmet (ACH) delivers advanced ballistic, fragmentation,and impact head protection, with comfort for long-term use. The helmet’s low-profile design reduces the risk of interference in target acquisition and ensures compatibility with NVGs and headsets.

5d5d8ca986f7742798716522.Name: SOE Micro Rig
5d5d8ca986f7742798716522.Description: Extra light and small chest rig with the necessary minimum of pouches.

5d5fca1ea4b93635fd598c07.Name: Crossbow tactical glasses
5d5fca1ea4b93635fd598c07.Description: Ballistic glasses with impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses.

5d63d33b86f7746ea9275524.Name: Flat screwdriver
5d63d33b86f7746ea9275524.Description: Flat screwdriver for installation work in hard to reach places.

5d6d3829a4b9361bc8618943.Name: LSHZ-2DTM face shield
5d6d3829a4b9361bc8618943.Description: The protective structure of the bulletproof faceshield for the helmet LSHZ-2DTM consists of a combination of composite material and bulletproof glass, which provides increased protection.

5d67abc1a4b93614ec50137f.Name: FN Five-seveN MK2 FDE Frame 5.7x28 pistol
5d67abc1a4b93614ec50137f.Description: The FN Five-seven, trademarked as the Five-seveN, is a semi-automatic pistol designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. Model with a Flat Dark Earth frame.

5d6e6772a4b936088465b17c.Name: 12/70 5.25mm Buckshot
5d6e6772a4b936088465b17c.Description: 12/70 shell loaded with 15 5.25mm buckshot for 12ga shotguns.

5d6d2e22a4b9361bd5780d05.Name: Gascan glasses
5d6d2e22a4b9361bd5780d05.Description: Ballistic shooting glasses. They not only protect your eyes, they also emphasize your unique style.

5d6d3be5a4b9361bc73bc763.Name: LSHZ-2DTM Aventail
5d6d3be5a4b9361bc73bc763.Description: Additional armor protection for lower back head part and neck for LSHZ-2DTM helmet.

5d6d2ef3a4b93618084f58bd.Name: RayBench Aviator glasses
5d6d2ef3a4b93618084f58bd.Description: Legendary mercenary glasses around the world. Wear them if you want to be cool, like Vovan from the neighborhood.

5d6d3943a4b9360dbc46d0cc.Name: LSHZ-2DTM Cover
5d6d3943a4b9360dbc46d0cc.Description: Black anti-glare cover for LSHZ-2DTM helmet.

5d6e689ca4b9361bc8618956.Name: 12/70 "Poleva-6u" Slug
5d6e689ca4b9361bc8618956.Description: 12/70 "Poleva-6u" with FMJ slug shell for 12ga shotguns

5d6e68dea4b9361bcc29e659.Name: 12/70 Dual Sabot Slug
5d6e68dea4b9361bcc29e659.Description: 12/70 Dual Sabot Slug shell for 12ga shotguns

5d6d3716a4b9361bc8618872.Description: The helmet "LSHZ-2DTM" is intended for periodic wearing with the purpose of protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s head, as well as for protection from bullets of small arms of a person’s face and neck when picking up a product with a visor and aventail.

5d6e67fba4b9361bc73bc779.Name: 12x70 6.5 mm "Express" Buckshot
5d6e67fba4b9361bc73bc779.Description: 12x70 shell loaded with 9 6.5mm buckshots for 12ga shotguns.

5d6e68c4a4b9361b93413f79.Name: 12x70 shell with .50 BMG bullet
5d6e68c4a4b9361b93413f79.Description: 12x70 Custom made slug shell with a shortened .50 BMG tracer bullet for 12ga shotguns. Noone knows, who and why reloading these strange slugs in Tarkov, but they just work... somehow.

5d6e68d1a4b93622fe60e845.Name: 12/70 HP Slug "SuperFormance"
5d6e68d1a4b93622fe60e845.Description: 12/70 SuperFormance Hollow Point slug shell for 12ga shotguns.

5d6e6806a4b936088465b17e.Description: 12/70 shell loaded with 16 8.5mm buckshot for 12ga shotguns.

5d6e68a8a4b9360b6c0d54e2.Name: 12/70 AP-20 Slug
5d6e68a8a4b9360b6c0d54e2.Description: 12/70 Armor-piercing slug shell for 12ga shotguns. For LAW and Military use ONLY.

5d6e68e6a4b9361c140bcfe0.Name: 12/70 FTX Custom LIte Slug
5d6e68e6a4b9361c140bcfe0.Description: 12/70 FTX Custom LIte Slug shell for 12ga shotguns

5d6e6869a4b9361c140bcfde.Name: 12/70 Grizzly 40 Slug
5d6e6869a4b9361c140bcfde.Description: 12/70 Grizzly 40 expanding slug shell for 12ga shotguns

5d6e68b3a4b9361bca7e50b5.Name: 12/70 HP Slug Copper Sabot Premier
5d6e68b3a4b9361bca7e50b5.Description: 12/70 Cooper solid slug shell for 12ga shotguns.

5d6e695fa4b936359b35d852.Name: 20/70 5.6mm Buckshot
5d6e695fa4b936359b35d852.Description: 20/70 shell loaded with 15 5.6mm buckshot for 20ga shotguns

5d6e6911a4b9361bd5780d52.Name: 12/70 Flechette
5d6e6911a4b9361bd5780d52.Description: 12/70 shell loaded with razor-sharp flechettes for 12ga shotguns. It never was that effective as even small buckshot, but trust me, it's better not to be shot with this.

5d6e6a5fa4b93614ec501745.Name: 20/70 Devastator Slug
5d6e6a5fa4b93614ec501745.Description: 20/70 Hollow Point Slug shell for 20ga shotguns.

5d6e69b9a4b9361bc8618958.Name: 20/70 6.2mm Buckshot
5d6e69b9a4b9361bc8618958.Description: 20/70 shell loaded with 12 6.2mm buckshot for 20ga shotguns

5d6e69c7a4b9360b6c0d54e4.Name: 20/70 7.3mm Buckshot
5d6e69c7a4b9360b6c0d54e4.Description: 20/70 shell loaded with 9 7.3mm buckshot for 20ga shotguns

5d6fc87386f77449db3db94e.Name: Gunpowder "Hawk"
5d6fc87386f77449db3db94e.Description: Tin with gunpowder. An essential resource for creating cartridges. A rare and high-quality mixture of high-energy ballistic gunpowder with stabilizing components.

5d7b6bafa4b93652786f4c76.Name: FN RMR Mount for 5-7 Mk.2
5d7b6bafa4b93652786f4c76.Description: Fabrique Nationale herstal Trijicon RMR sight mount, also compatible with Holosun HS507C.

5d8e15b686f774445103b190.Name: Key to HEP station storage

5df24cf80dee1b22f862e9bc.Name: Orsis T-5000 .308 sniper rifle
5df24cf80dee1b22f862e9bc.Description: High-accuracy ORSIS T-5000 rifle is an outstanding result of our company designers' efforts. This model was created in cooperation with professional shooters and has the properties required fora customer in the Russian market. T-5000 model is a hand-reloaded repeater with sliding breech bolt and two front locking lugs. It is a multi-purpose weapon. Its specifications provide high-accuracy long-range shots (up to 1500m), high level of shooter's convenience while preparatory, firing and recoil phases, swift sighting line recovery, excellent reliability and ergonomics.

5de7bd7bfd6b4e6e2276dc25.Name: B&T MP9-N 9x19 Submachinegun
5de7bd7bfd6b4e6e2276dc25.Description: The MP9-N is a further modification of a MP-9 SMG, which was refined and optimized in cooperation with special units from police and military. The MP9-N is currently in service with close protection teams as well as with SWAT teams worldwide. It is also a perfect choice as a Personal Defense Weapon (PDW).

An ambidextrous bolt release, selector, and magazine release offers the left-handed user the ergonomic advantages inherent to AR15 based controls, as well as giving right-handed users alternate methods of manipulation to increase efficiency of movement. The Drop-In 2-Stage Trigger serves as an aid to long range precision marksmanship. The E2 bolt and gas system provides superior reliability in function whether suppressed or unsuppressed.

5df8a4d786f77412672a1e3b.Name: 6SH118 raid backpack
5df8a4d786f77412672a1e3b.Description:
The raid backpack 6Sh118 is a set of combat equipment of the 2nd generation "Ratnik" gear kit.
The 6Sh118 tactical army backpack is a modernization of the model of the raid backpack called 6B38 Permyachka. The raid 6Sh118 backpack is an element of individual military equipment of military personnel, designed to carry fire support equipment, weapons, ammunition, elements of mountain equipment, as well as his personal belongings. The backpack can be used during combat operations, during long transitions and raid events.

5e01ef6886f77445f643baa4.Name: Team Wendy EXFIL Ballistic Helmet Coyote

5df8a58286f77412631087ed.Description: Tank headset TSh-4M-L (Z) -01 is designed to provide two-way radiotelephone communication in objects with a high level of noise, to protect it from climatic factors and from impacts on structural elements of objects.

5df8a42886f77412640e2e75.Description: Multi-Purpose Patrol Vest is designed for those patrolling situations where armor is not needed. Light rig with a lot of pouches.

5df917564a9f347bc92edca3.Description: A 16 inch barrel for AR-10 based weapons for 7.62x51 NATO ammo, 406mm long.

5dfa397fb11454561e39246c.Description: A 20-inch barrel for AR-10 based weapons for 7.62x51 NATO ammo, 508mm long.

5dfa3d2b0dee1b22f862eade.Name: KAC PRS QDC 7.62x51 Sound Suppressor
5dfa3d2b0dee1b22f862eade.Description: Knight's Armament Company PRS QDC sound suppressor, which can be installed over a compatable Knight's Armament flashhider.

5e2af51086f7746d3f3c3402.Description: Unified Fuse Hand Grenade Modified - unlike UZRG, it contains inside the aluminum bushings a slow-burned pyrotechnic composition with high combustion stability and an azide detonator capsule in an aluminum sleeve. A vital component for the production of grenades.

5e2aef7986f7746d3f3c33f5.Name: Repellent
5e2aef7986f7746d3f3c33f5.Description: Aerosol against mosquitoes, flies and other small insects.

5e2af02c86f7746d420957d4.Name: Pack of chlorine
5e2af02c86f7746d420957d4.Description: Chlorine lime is a highly hazardous technical mixture of hypochlorite, chloride and calcium hydroxide. Widely used for bleaching and disinfection.

5e2af00086f7746d3f3c33f7.Description: The cleaner fluid is a solution of inorganic alkali, additionally containing active additives. Used for cleaning toilets, pipes and drains.

5e2aedd986f7746d404f3aa4.Name: GreenBat lithium battery
5e2aedd986f7746d404f3aa4.Description: 3.7 volt battery with a nominal capacity of 3400 mAh. Used in lighting and engineering devices.

5e2aee0a86f774755a234b62.Name: Cyclon accumulator battery
5e2aee0a86f774755a234b62.Description: Special storage battery for industrial and military devices.

5e2af22086f7746d3f3c33fa.Name: Tube of Poxeram Cold Welding
5e2af22086f7746d3f3c33fa.Description: It is an adhesive composition that has a high degree of plasticity. It consists of epoxy resin and is a two-component substance with metal dust.

5e2af29386f7746d4159f077.Name: KEKTAPE duct tape
5e2af29386f7746d4159f077.Description: KEKTAPE will not be able to patch up your difficult Tarkov fate, But it will be able to fix the boat. Close up a hole in the aquarium. There are lots of things KEKTAPE can do.

5e2af47786f7746d404f3aaa.Name: Fleece cloth
5e2af47786f7746d404f3aaa.Description: Insulated, lightweight and water-repellent fabric for the production of various clothes both military and civilian.

5e2af41e86f774755a234b67.Name: Polyamide fabric Cordura
5e2af41e86f774755a234b67.Description: This is a polyamide fabric, in which due to the special structure of the thread (made from cut and twisted fibers) fourfold resistance to abrasion is achieved compared to plain nylon, also consisting of polyamide. Significantly superior to conventional fabric in tensile strength and abrasion resistance. Used for the manufacture of equipment for various purposes: bags, backpacks and additional items to them, waist and bag belts, cases for carrying weapons and so on.

5e2af2bc86f7746d3f3c33fc.Name: Hunter matches
5e2af2bc86f7746d3f3c33fc.Description: Special hunting matches that burn in the wind and in the water (yes! For real!). Soviet heritage.

5e2af37686f774755a234b65.Name: SurvL Survivor Lighter
5e2af37686f774755a234b65.Description: Water and windproof lighter for survival in difficult conditions. Well, or just for firing up the cig, you decide, brother.

5e2af4a786f7746d3f3c3400.Name: Ripstop cloth
5e2af4a786f7746d3f3c3400.Description: Ripstop fabrics are woven fabrics, often made of nylon, using a special reinforcing technique that makes them resistant to tearing and ripping. Used for special and military cloth and gear production.

5e2af4d286f7746d4159f07a.Name: Aramid fiber cloth
5e2af4d286f7746d4159f07a.Description: Aramid fibers are a class of heat-resistant and strong synthetic fibers. They are used in aerospace and military applications, for ballistic-rated body armor fabric and ballistic composites, in bicycle tires, marine cordage, marine hull reinforcement, and as an asbestos substitute.

5e2af55f86f7746d4159f07c.Name: Grenade case
5e2af55f86f7746d4159f07c.Description: Big and useful case for hand grenades

5e32f56fcb6d5863cc5e5ee4.Name: VOG-17 Khattabka grenade
5e32f56fcb6d5863cc5e5ee4.Description: DIY hand grenade based on a VOG-17 grenade called "Khattabka". The grenade is VOG-17 explosive projectile, with the removed head part, containing the detonator and self-destructor.

5e340dcdcb6d5863cc5e5efb.Name: VOG-25 Khattabka grenade
5e340dcdcb6d5863cc5e5efb.Description: Hand-made hand grenade "Khattabka" based on a VOG-25 grenade. The grenade is a VOG-25 grenade with a removed warhead, added a detonator and self-destructor. A short fuse has been installed to speed up the ignition.

5e42c81886f7742a01529f57.Name: Object #11SR keycard
5e42c81886f7742a01529f57.Description: Electronic reusable key card, belongs, according by the logo, to TerraGroup Corporation.

5e42c71586f7747f245e1343.Name: ULTRA medical storage key
5e42c71586f7747f245e1343.Description: Metal key to the medical storage in the Ultra shopping center

5e42c83786f7742a021fdf3c.Name: Object #21WS keycard
5e42c83786f7742a021fdf3c.Description: Electronic reusable key card, belonging, according by the logo, to  TerraGroup Corporation.

5e4abc6786f77406812bd572.Name: LBT-2670 Slim Field Med Pack
5e4abc6786f77406812bd572.Description: Low-profile medical backpack, which allows you to very effectively place various specialized tools and medicines.

5e4abfed86f77406a2713cf7.Name: Splav Tarzan M22 Rig
5e4abfed86f77406a2713cf7.Description: Simple and fairly convenient tactical rig. It is still actively used by security and law enforcement agencies and civilian shooters in Russia.

5e4abc1f86f774069619fbaa.Name: Spiritus Systems Bank Robber Chest Rig
5e4abc1f86f774069619fbaa.Description: Ultra-compact and lightweight chest rig for additional mobility and comfort.

5e4abb5086f77406975c9342.Name: LBT 6094A Slick Plate Carrier
5e4abb5086f77406975c9342.Description: Simple plate carrier by LBT company. The most minimalistic design intended for use with chest rigs.

5e4ac41886f77406a511c9a8.Name: Ars Arma CPC MOD.2 plate carrier

This modular body armor is based on a polymer corset that fits the body, which avoids the backlash of the body arm during active movement and also contributes to a evener distribution of weight. Made in the assault configuration of pouches and armor elements.
